title: I want to delete my emails locally, not necessarily from the server
content:
Title. Thunderbird is a really cool client but it's pretty slow. I blame that on the thousands upon thousands of emails that my hotmail and gmail each hold. I don't necessarily want to delete these emails, but I have seldom a reason to have any email older than 2 months in my thunderbird client slowing and crashing the program whenever I want to combine inboxes.

To this end I went to "Synchronization & Storage" and told it to "Synchronize the most recent 2 months" but it didn't delete the huge cluster of older emails. The next option is to tell TB to delete these emails in the same menu but as I understand it that would also delete them in the server, which I don't want to do for posteriority.

What do I do?
creator: omega.19994

title: Cannot select OAuth when configuring an account manually
content:
I want to setup my Gmail account that my school hosts. It has a unique domain name and Thunderbird does not recognize it as a Gmail account, but I'm sure it is. Here's what I did to solve the problem (yet no luck) First, I tried to setup with manual IMAP configuraiton by following the steps on LifeWire Article and Google Support, but it says that credentials that I'm using is wrong. It did detect the Gmail mail server though. Next, I tried to pretend that I'm going to login as a user I've created ON GOOGLE so thunderbird can recognize it as Gmail Account, then logged in with my school credential, and it failed. Probably because I've entered fake Gmail address in the form. It's very inconvenient that I cannot setup mail accounts with OAuth authentication method manually.

Do you have a walkaround for this?

title: Relevant Auto Complete / Google Mail Autocomplete
content:
Hello,

I'm using Thunderbird for my private and company e-mails (different companies). I need to pay close attention to selecting the right names as the auto suggest for recipients isn't using the context of the current account. Is there a plugin or setting I've missed that considers the context of composing a mail and priorities collected e-mails from the respective account or recent conversations for example? Good example is the Gmail auto complete, that has a good suggestion ranking.

Best I could find was options to sync with Google Mail contacts, but that would require to maintain a list of contacts in Google Mail, which I don't do.

Best, Elmar

title: Thunderbird 115.10.0 (64bit) non si apre
content: Buongiorno, a seguito dell'ultimo aggiornamento di qualche giorno fa alla versione 115.10.0 ho notato che Thunderbird non si apre correttamente. Mi spiego: se clicco sull'icona sul desktop, dopo qualche secondo di clessidra, non succede nulla. Allora vado in task manager e vedo che risultano aperti 3 processi di Thunderbird ma non l'applicazione. Per risolvere devo fare "termina attività" su uno dei 3 processi aperti, cliccare nuovamente sull'icona desktop e a questo punto il programma si apre. Prima dell'aggiornamento del 16.04.2024 non succedeva. Grazie a chi vorrà aiutarmi. Francesco
creator: comofrancesco

title: Dopo aggiornamento a 115.10.0 (64 bit) non funziona più in uscita uno degli account
content:
Buongiorno,

Fino a prima dell'ultimo aggiornamento i miei due account su fastweb funzionavano entrambi in uscita. Ora ne funziona solo più uno, e alternativamente, a seconda di cosa indico come nome utente nella finestra delle impostazioni - server smtp. Quel che indico per un account, modifica le impostazioni anche per l'altro. Sicchè in uscita gli account agiscono solo in alternativa, anche se aggiungo un nuovo server smtp (anche perchè è lo stesso server fastweb e comunque solo uno rimane come predefinito) Quando cerco di spedire da uno dei due account, l'esito è sempre negativo:

"Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: MAIL FROM:<******@fastwebnet.it> does not match authenticated user name. Verificare l’indirizzo email nelle impostazioni dell’account e riprovare."

Non capisco cosa devo fare per poter uscire con entrambi gli account, come ho fatto fino a l'altro ieri e per anni.

Grazie per una mano. Un saluto a tutti.
creator: nevvy2021

title: TB calendar incorrect translation of machine time zone (Windows 11)
content:
Hello! I am facing the issue with time zone translations. Here is what I do. First, I create event on web-interface of the google calendar. That account is linked to TB's calendar. This calendar has settings for my timezone as in the first screenshot, that is GMT+3 for Kyiv, Ukraine. It is actually GMT+2 + daylight saving hour in effect. Country is also set to Ukraine. Next, my Windows 11 system is set to set time and timezone automatically, region - Ukraine. It displays UTC+2 Helsinki, Kyiv,... I guess it's Windows settings display quirk, because time is correct and WSL console shows

~$ date -R Thu, 18 Apr 2024 18:59:25 +0300

My TB's calendar is set to have system's timezone as in 3rd screenshot.

Now if I see my event in TB calendar, it is placed one hour later, say 9 am event starts at 10. So reminders also come hour later. Also strange thing is that event properties in TB show correct time like 9:00 till 10:40, but for some strange timezone Europe/Zaporozhye, as in 4th picture.

However, if I set TB's calendar manually to Europe/Kiev (which should be Kyiv, but that's another story), then events are shifted hour up to their right place, 9 am. So this is my issue: when I set calendar forcibly to Kyiv timezone, it does translate it right. When I ask calendar to rely on system's timezone, which indeed is also Kyiv, then I get one hour behind.
creator: v.kazmirenko

title: Startup swamps and stalls
content:
OSX 12.7.4

I upgraded to 115.9.0 to get OAuth for some, but not all, accounts. Those on Gmail & Yahoo are OAuth. I have non-OAuth accounts on a Zimbra server, and on Panix.com.

It prompts for the first account's password. TBird then gobbles all available CPU on the machine, and stays there. If I wait long enough, it becomes usable again, but that may well be hours.

However, once it calms down, it works normally.

Intertwined with this is: TBird rejects the Zimbra passwords as I enter them. I retry and retry, and then they succeed. I know the passwords are correct; I've even typed them out, and then copy&pasted them in. I'm not sure about the Panix account, if its password works the first time or not.

I tried restarting in troubleshooting mode; it made no difference.

title: Image files as attachments vs. part of body text
content:
I'm using the latest version of THUNDERBIRD for WINDOWS (now 10 HOME), but this problem has existed for years with previous versions of THUNDERBIRD and former releases of WINDOWS, both HOME & PRO releases. And, it seems to be very specific. When i receive e-mails from (especially) 2 friends who both use AOL as their e-mail client, when I receive them, the imaged files (or memes) are always 'converted into attachments, and what shows in the Body Text of the e-mails is empty boxes. Yet, when I get e-mails from others, including from commercial sources, if there are images within the Body Text, they are present there. This IS very annoying because many times the e-mails I get from these two friends are technical e-mails, with clarifying images as part of the Body Text. When I have mentioned this to them, their responses are that n one else complains, only me, and so the problem MUST BE at my end, but that doesn't make sense, since when I receive e-mails from others (Gmail, etal.) any included images are fully where they belong. ++++++++++++++++++++ Secondly, WHY is it that when there are threaded e-mails in the Sent folder, the ARROW to expand the thread appears at the left side, but in the Delete folder the ARROW appears between the title of the e-mail & the next column? This IS very annoying!!!! Also, when I'm in the DELETE folder, sometimes only two options appear at the right side: Archive Delete, BUT in other incidences, there's a plethora of alternative options, and the Delete option is positioned in a different place. More often than not, I click on the option to send it e-mail to the Archive folder, when I really wanted to Delete it permanently. Another major annoyance!!!! Thank you robert herold 

 17mkombi@gmail.com   OR   rhh.jr5387@gmail.com
creator: KARL_TAUSCHEN
